data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the Town.
The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.
There's a the temple, a temple, a small wooden house, a farm, a town, a building, two blacksmiths, an out house, two armorys, and two pubs here.
The blacksmith apprentice is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The town was established as a small settlement well outside of the castle walls. data.short_motivation: I want to let the blacksmith know I care about him
data.mid_motivation: I want to let the people of the town know I care about them.
data.long_motivation: I want to continue to help people in the town and make them feel loved.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the shop beside the blacksmith
